Name: schemaname
column6: name of schema containing table policy is on

Name: tablename
column6: name of table policy is on

Name: polpermissive
column6: is the policy permissive or restrictive?

Name: roles
column6: the roles to which this policy applies

Name: cmd
column6: the command type to which the policy is applied

Name: qual
column6: the expression added to the security barrier qualifications for queries that this policy applies to

Name: with_check
column6: the expression added to the with check qualifications for queries that attempt to add rows to this table
